constraints.name: operation_limit
constraints.description: 操作次数限制，最多可以插入 n 个元素

constraints.name: frequency_bound
constraints.description: 每个值的频次上限为 n，即每种值最多出现 n 次
constraints.formal: freq[i] <= n for all i in [1, n]

constraints.name: subset_constraint
constraints.description: 三元组子集约束，三个相同值的元素构成一个三元组
constraints.formal: triplet_subset = {i, i, i} for some i in [1, n]

constraints.name: adjacency_relation
constraints.description: 连续子集约束，三个连续值的元素构成一个连续子集
constraints.formal: straight_subset = {i, i+1, i+2} for some i in [1, n-2]
